title: Out Of Tragedy, A New Brazilian Presidential Contender Emerges
teaser: The death of Brazil's Socialist Party presidential candidate created an opportunity for his running mate, Marina Silva. Her entry into the race has upended the situation. Whereas the man she replaced was running a distant third in polls, support for Silva has surged.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
